body:
I'd like to crack this discussion open now and hear what General Discussion is looking for from this community and the Boards. A couple of your members voiced that there is a list in a metaphorical bathroom stall somewhere so let's hear it.  

I can't make any solid promises but I can do two things:

1. If you ask for something and we're working on it already, I will tell you. 
2. If there is something you're asking for and we're not working on it, I will do my best to tell you why and / or take those suggestions into consideration. 

This may have been done before in a million places but I am making this the one place inside of GD. [EDIT] I will sticky after a few days and update as work gets done. 


----

Also, What's up. Can I hang out?
{{champion:96}}
